body:
• REST - use your browser, cURL or language-specific http library
  • PBC - well documented interface, faster than using REST
  • REST and PBC not at feature parity
  • Existing language-specific clients
    • Erlang - PBC and REST
    • Java - PBC and REST
    • PHP - REST
    • Javascript - REST
    • Ruby - REST and PBC
    • Node.js - REST
  • There are many other non-official clients
    • I'm currently working on a .NET PBC Client
